body_html:
There is work in progress to implement while loops using different primitives. These should allow 2nd order gradients. Unfortunately there's no estimate when this will be ready.

body:
There is work in progress to implement while loops using different
primitives. These should allow 2nd order gradients.  Unfortunately there's
no estimate when this will be ready.

On Sun, Aug 19, 2018, 5:46 PM pythonanonuser <notifications@github.com>
wrote:
